label: MetricCharacteristic
comment: A prominent attribute or aspect of a metric (a standard of measurement).

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying the content type of this product characteristic.
A value, expressed as a monetary value, for this document characteristic.
A date, time, date time or other date time value for this document characteristic.
The value for this metric characteristic expressed as an indicator.
A method specified for a value of this metric characteristic.
A value, expressed as a number, for this document characteristic.
A parameter specified for a value for this metric characteristic.
A value, expressed as a quantity, for this document characteristic.
A range specified for a value of this metric characteristic.
A tolerance specified for a value of this metric characteristic.

referencedBy.comment: A prominent attribute or aspect of a metric (a standard of measurement).
The maximum metric characteristic specified for this target issue.
The minimum metric characteristic specified for this target issue.
The metric characteristic specified for this target issue.
